---
id: post-payment-consent-callback-url
title: "Create a redirect callback URL"
description: "This method is called to create a redirect callback URL. This URL will be used in the 'redirectUrl'  field in the Payment Consent creation endpoints. This will be the URL that the user will be  redirected to, after the approval/rejection of the consent in the ASPSP's app."
sidebar_label: "Create a redirect callback URL"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a redirect callback URL"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/receiver/payment/consent/callback-url"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called to create a redirect callback URL. This URL will be used in the 'redirectUrl'  field in the Payment Consent creation endpoints. This will be the URL that the user will be  redirected to, after the approval/rejection of the consent in the ASPSP's app.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Payload for Payment Consent Redirect Callback URL creation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["description","redirectUrl"],"title":"ObkPayInitiationRedirectCallbackUrlRequest","type":"object","properties":{"redirectUrl":{"pattern":"^(https:\\/\\/)((?!#).)*$","type":"string","description":"The Redirect URL that will be registered on the Software Statement and used to make the callback of the Payment Initiations"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"A description of the url, can be the name of it or an short description to identify it for you"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
